questions.question: The switch in the below circuit does what?

choices.answer: Resists electricity flow
Supplies voltage
Opens and closes the circuit
Lights up

questions.question: To increase the total current in the circuit shown below, you would...

choices.answer: Take away a battery
Take away a bulb
Add a bulb
Add a switch

questions.question: If all of the lightbulbs are identical, the voltage across the second bulb is...

choices.answer: The same as the first bulb
The same as the battery
The same as the first bulb AND the battery
Not the same as any other lightbulb

questions.question: To increase the resistance in the series circuit shown, we would...

choices.answer: Add a battery
Add a bulb
Take away a battery
Take away a bulb

questions.question: To find the total resistance in the circuit shown, we would...

choices.answer: Use just the resistance in the first bulb
Add the sum of the inverses of the resistances of all bulbs
Add up the resistances of all of the bulbs
Multiply the resistance of each bulb by 3

questions.question: If we want to decrease the voltage in the parallel circuit shown, we would...

choices.answer: Add a battery
Add a branch with another bulb
Add a bulb to an existing branch
Take away a battery

questions.question: To increase the current in the parallel circuit shown, you should...

choices.answer: Add another branch with a bulb
Add a bulb to an existing branch
Add a switch
Take away a branch with a bulb in it

questions.question: The voltage in the middle bulb is...

choices.answer: Equal to the voltage of the sum of the other bulbs
Not equal to anything on the circuit
Equal to the voltage in the battery
Equal to the voltage times the number of bulbs

questions.question: The current in the battery is...

choices.answer: Equal to the current in the branch
Equal to the sum of the currents in the branches
Not equal to anything shown

questions.question: The current in the series circuit is...

choices.answer: The sum of the current in each bulb
The same everywhere
Different in each bulb

questions.question: To increase the resistance of the parallel circuit shown, we should...

choices.answer: Add a branch with a bulb
Take away a branch with a bulb
Add a battery
Add a switch
